korean: 친한 친구가 해외로 이사를 간다는 소식을 들었다.
친구의 새로운 시작을 응원하지만 아쉬운 마음도 커.
자주 못 만날 것 같아서 서운했다.
english: I heard the news that a close friend is moving abroad.
I support my friend's new beginning, but I also feel regretful.
It made me sad that we won't be able to meet often.
It was a happy but slightly sad day.
